name: Drunkoff V.
description:
Drunkoff V. - is a short narrative game with horror elements. The plot of the game is unassuming and the gameplay is unremarkable. The game also contains many different jokes and references.

Drunkoff V. is a classic walking simulator that tells the dramatic story of the main character.

Average Playthrough Time: 60 Minutes.


Do you know what can ruin a person's life? I suppose there can be many such reasons. One such reason was what happened to the main character.

Citizen Drankov was a respected man and worked in a secret government organization. He was in good standing with the leadership, and this had negative consequences for him. You will have to go through the key moments of our hero's life. Waking up on the street near garbage cans, Drankov realizes that he doesn't remember anything and tries to figure out what happened. His crippled mind begins to play a cruel joke with him. To top it off, the skeletons in his closet decide to do their sinister dance.

Features of the Game:
- Main Genre: "Walking Simulator."
- Gameplay approximates the realities of a person suffering from delirium.
